This endpoints get images that belong to a collection.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"include_image_language","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"A comma-separated list of `ISO 639-1` language codes to filter images by language. Use `null` to include images without a language tag. Example- `en,null` to retrieve images in English and those without a specified language. For more information, refer to the [documentation](/parameters/image_languages)."},{"name":"language","in":"query","description":"The language in which to retrieve movie details, specified using an ISO 639-1 code (e.g., \"en\" for English, \"fr\" for French).","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"collection_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"a uniques identfier for a movie or tv collection","schema":{"type":"integer","example":456}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
